means: 没有被搅动（过）的，未受激动的

sentence.Network_en: The ingredients sat in the bowl unstirred while she buttered the pan.
sentence.Network_cn: 在她为平底锅抹黄油时,各种配料在碗里沉淀下来.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 透入小肠黏膜表面的不移动
PerfectNetExp.abs: ...m的微粒(micelles)，借水溶性特性，微粒可透入小肠黏膜表面的不移动(unstirred)液层，微粒中的脂肪通过被动扩散，被肠黏膜上皮 …
unstinted 充裕的, unstirred 未搅拌, unstinting 没有限制的

auth_sentence.content: The actors can shake his image all they like, but the man himself is unstirred.
